title: Price drop: Upgrade to Windows 11 Pro for less than $10
description: This Windows 11 sale allows you to upgrade your PC to Windows 11 Pro for less than $10. (via Cult of Mac - Your source for the latest Apple news, rumors, analysis, reviews, how-tos and deals.)
author: Cult of Mac Deals
excerpt: This Windows 11 sale allows you to upgrade your PC to Windows 11 Pro for less than $10.
text: Deals See what Windows 11 can do for you with this limited-time price drop. Photo: Cult of Mac Deals Not every Cult of Mac reader is all Mac, all the time. We know many of you use PCs for various reasons — and here’s the big Windows 11 sale you’ve been waiting for. You can get a lifetime license to Windows 11 Pro for less than $10 from Cult of Mac Deals. Windows 11 sale: Get Windows 11 Pro at a steep discount For PC owners, upgrading to the latest Microsoft operating system just makes sense. For one thing, installing it means you get access to updates and other features as they roll out, keeping your computer running smoothly and safely. Plus, upgrading means you can access all the latest advances on your computer. Microsoft Teams, biometrics and more Windows 11 Pro comes with Microsoft Teams, which you can use to set up remote meetings with a single click on the taskbar. Plus, the new biometrics login functionality makes sure that you — and only you — can access your device. You can even set up a “wake and lock” mode that powers on before you sit down. The OS also offers full touchscreen support. And you can use Windows Studio Effects to touch up your photo album in ways you never thought possible. And speaking of looks, DirectX 12 Ultimate will make you feel like you’re right in the middle of your favorite games. Upgrade your PC for less with this Windows 11 sale You can rely on Microsoft’s latest operating system. It’s rated an average of 4.7 out of 5 stars by verified purchasers at Cult of Mac Deals. And it’s on sale for now: Get Windows 11 Pro for just $9.97. That’s a 94% discount off the regular price of $199. Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post about our Windows 11 sale on August 25, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
html:
• Deals

Not every Cult of Mac reader is all Mac, all the time. We know many of you use PCs for various reasons — and here’s the big Windows 11 sale you’ve been waiting for.

You can get a lifetime license to Windows 11 Pro for less than $10 from Cult of Mac Deals.

Windows 11 sale: Get Windows 11 Pro at a steep discount

For PC owners, upgrading to the latest Microsoft operating system just makes sense. For one thing, installing it means you get access to updates and other features as they roll out, keeping your computer running smoothly and safely. Plus, upgrading means you can access all the latest advances on your computer.

Microsoft Teams, biometrics and more

Windows 11 Pro comes with Microsoft Teams, which you can use to set up remote meetings with a single click on the taskbar. Plus, the new biometrics login functionality makes sure that you — and only you — can access your device. You can even set up a “wake and lock” mode that powers on before you sit down.

The OS also offers full touchscreen support. And you can use Windows Studio Effects to touch up your photo album in ways you never thought possible. And speaking of looks, DirectX 12 Ultimate will make you feel like you’re right in the middle of your favorite games.

Upgrade your PC for less with this Windows 11 sale

You can rely on Microsoft’s latest operating system. It’s rated an average of 4.7 out of 5 stars by verified purchasers at Cult of Mac Deals. And it’s on sale for now: Get Windows 11 Pro for just $9.97. That’s a 94% discount off the regular price of $199.

Buy from: Cult of Mac Deals

Prices subject to change. All sales handled by StackSocial, our partner who runs Cult of Mac Deals. For customer support, please email StackSocial directly. We originally published this post about our Windows 11 sale on August 25, 2023. We updated the pricing info.
